cluster_information.name: Application Basic
cluster_information.description: Provides information about a Content App running on a Video Player device which is represented as an endpoint.

attributes.name: VendorName
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify a human readable (displayable) name of the vendor for the Content App.

attributes.name: VendorID
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify the Vendor ID for the Content App.

attributes.name: ApplicationName
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify a human readable (displayable) name of the Content App.

attributes.name: ProductID
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify the Product ID for the Content App.

attributes.name: Application
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify the Application for this Content App.

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify the current running status of the application.

attributes.name: ApplicationVersion
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify the version of the Content App.

attributes.name: AllowedVendorList
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify the list of vendor IDs that are allowed to control this Content App.
